name: the one where Kelly wants to register a new visit on a pet with already registered visits using the Web application
scenarioId: classpath:features/visits/visits_management:the one where Kelly wants to register a new visit on a pet with already registered visits using the Web application
methodName: the one where Kelly wants to register a new visit on a pet with already registered visits using the Web application

testSteps.description:
Given Kelly has registered the following owner in the system
| firstName | lastName | address | city | phone |
| Hugh | Jackman | hollywood avenue 123 | LA | 1762369874 |

And she has registered the following pets for Hugh Jackman
| name | birthDate | type |
| Nagiri | 2013-05-20 | snake |
| Mew | 2019-01-20 | cat |

And she has registered the following visit for Mew using the Web application
| date | description |
| 03-15-2016 | check skin problem |

When she registers the following visit for Mew using the Web application
| date | description |
| 08-25-2019 | snake is having problems with the skin |

children.description: Kelly registers a new visit for the pet Mew
Kelly navigates to Hugh Jackman information page
Kelly clicks on the Add Visit button for Mew
Kelly enters '08-25-2019' into the visit date field
Kelly enters 'snake is having problems with the skin' into the description field
Kelly clicks on 'Add New Visit' button

testSteps.description: Then the visit should be displayed in the owner information page

children.description: For Kelly: Then the displayed visits of the pet Mew should be a collection containing (snake is having problems with the skin visit on 2019-08-25)

userStory.storyName: The Pet Clinic should allow to manage the visits information
userStory.displayName: The Pet Clinic should allow to manage the visits information
userStory.narrative:
As a VetClinic Manager
  I would like to be able to manage the visits information
  In order to be able to know the information of the visits made by the pets
  Or register new visits for the pets

title: the one where Kelly wants to register a new visit on a pet with already registered visits using the Web application
